title: Garland Formally Bars Justice Dept. From Seizing Reporters’ Records
description: The rule codifies and expands a policy he issued in 2021, after it came to light that the Trump administration had secretly gone after records of reporters for The Times, The Washington Post and CNN.
dc:creator: Charlie Savage
media:credit: Jeenah Moon for The New York Times
media:description: The changes, Attorney General Merrick B. Garland said, “recognize the crucial role that a free and independent press plays in our democracy.”
